sectionDescription: Enjoy our comprehensive range of facilities and services

amenities.title: Free WiFi
amenities.description: Complimentary high-speed internet access available throughout the property

amenities.title: Fully Equipped Kitchen
amenities.description: Complete with microwave, toaster, refrigerator, coffee machine and kitchenware

amenities.title: Rooftop Swimming Pool
amenities.description: Enjoy scenic views from the rooftop pool area with shallow end and pool towels provided

amenities.title: Beachfront Location
amenities.description: Property provides beachfront accommodations just minutes from Kamala Beach

amenities.title: Free On-Site Parking
amenities.description: Convenient parking available directly at the property for guests

amenities.title: Air Conditioning
amenities.description: Climate control available in all units for your comfort

amenities.title: Garden & Sun Terrace
amenities.description: Relax in the beautifully maintained garden or sunbathe on the terrace

amenities.title: 24-Hour Security
amenities.description: CCTV in common areas and outside property with around-the-clock security personnel

amenities.title: Kathu Waterfall
amenities.description: Explore the beautiful Kathu Waterfall, a natural attraction nearby
